cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.simulation.hierarchy

Class HierarchicalPlanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.simulation.hierarchy.HierarchicalPlanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HierarchicalAccessMonitor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LRUCascadeMigrationPlanner

    public abstract class HierarchicalPlanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements HierarchicalAccessMonitor
    Monitors file access and plans file migration during simulation of a hierarchical method.

      • getStorageAvailableSpace

        public ByteSize getStorageAvailableSpace(ServerStorage storage,
                                         ModelServerNode server)
        Calculates storage available space from storage currently unused space and reserved space for ongoing migration operations. Returned ByteSize bytes will be always non-negative.
        Parameters:
        server - target server
        storage - target storage
        Returns:
        available space

      • getHighestAvailableStorage

        public ServerStorage getHighestAvailableStorage(FsFile file,
                                                ModelServerNode server)
        Internal method. Select highest storage that file can be migrated onto and simultaneously build a migration plan in order to fit file onto server.
        Parameters:
        file - migrated file
        server - target server
        Returns:
        fastest possible storage

      • onBeforeAccess

        public void onBeforeAccess(FsFile file,
                           ModelServerNode server,
                           SimulationTask task,
                           DfsSimulatorLogger logger,
                           long sTime)
        Will be called before file is accessed during a specific SimulationTask. File can be accessed MULTIPLE times during single task when dynamic pathing is enabled.
        Specified by:
        onBeforeAccess in interface HierarchicalAccessMonitor
        Parameters:
        file - accessed file
        server - server, on which the file is present
        task - running simulation task
        logger - current simulation logger
        sTime - current simulation time

                          SimulationTask task,

        Parameters:

        server - server, on which the file is present

        logger - current simulation logger
